3495 template<typename app_traits>
3496 void CFF<app_traits>::ReadCharSet( data_io::BufferedDataStore& bds )
3497 {
3498  switch (m_charSetRgn.begin) {
3499  case cff_ISOAdobeCharset: {
3500  static const CharSetElement iso[2] = { {0, 0, 229}, {229, 0xffffffff, 0} };
3501  m_CharSetArray = const_cast<CharSetElement*>(&iso[0]);
3502  } break;
3503  case cff_ExpertCharset: {
3504  static const CharSetElement excs[18] = {
3505  #include "tetraphilia/fonts/data/excs0.h"
3506  };
3507  m_CharSetArray = const_cast<CharSetElement*>(&excs[0]);
3508  } break;
3509  case cff_ExpertSubsetCharset: {
3510  static const CharSetElement exsubcs[24] = {
3511  #include "tetraphilia/fonts/data/exsubcs0.h"
3512  };
3513  m_CharSetArray = const_cast<CharSetElement*>(&exsubcs[0]);
3514  } break;
3515  default: {
3516  /* Custom charset */
3517  size_t gid = 1; // zero is the implied .notdef
3518  size_t size = 2;
3519 
3520  bds.Seek(static_cast<size_t>(m_charSetRgn.begin));
3521 
3522  switch (data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 1)) {
3523  case 0: {
3524  m_CharSetArrayPtr.resize( t4::add<size_t>( m_charStringsIndex.count, 1 ) );
3525  m_CharSetArray = m_CharSetArrayPtr.data();
3526  m_CharSetArray[0].m_firstGID = 0;
3527  m_CharSetArray[0].m_firstSID = 0;
3528  m_CharSetArray[0].m_numGlyphs = 1;
3529  bool needSort = false;
3530  while ( gid < m_charStringsIndex.count ) {
3531  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_firstGID = gid;
3532  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_firstSID = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 2 );
3533  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_numGlyphs = 1;
3534  if ( m_CharSetArray[gid].m_firstSID < m_CharSetArray[gid-1].m_firstSID )
3535  needSort = true;
3536  ++gid;
3537  }
3538  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_firstGID = gid;
3539  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_firstSID = 0xffffffff;
3540  m_CharSetArray[gid].m_numGlyphs = 0;
3541  m_numCIDs = m_CharSetArray[gid-1].m_firstSID+1;
3542  m_CIDCharSetIsIdentity = false;
3543  if ( needSort )
3544  tetraphilia::qsort( &m_CharSetArray[0], gid, sizeof(CharSetElement), nullptr, &(SortCharSetElements<app_traits> ) );
3545 
3546  } break;
3547  case 1:
3548  size = 1;
3549  /* Fall through */
3550  TETRAPHILIA_SWITCH_FALLTHROUGH;
3551 
3552  case 2:
3553  if ( m_flags & kCIDFont ) {
3554  size_t cid = 1;
3555  while ( gid < m_charStringsIndex.count ) {
3556  size_t startCID = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 2 );
3557  if ( startCID != cid )
3558  m_CIDCharSetIsIdentity = false;
3559  size_t numCIDs = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, size ) + 1;
3560  gid += numCIDs;
3561  cid = startCID + numCIDs;
3562  }
3563  m_numCIDs = cid;
3564  gid = 1;
3565  bds.Seek(static_cast<size_t>(m_charSetRgn.begin)+1);
3566  } else
3567  m_CIDCharSetIsIdentity = false;
3568 
3569  if ( !m_CIDCharSetIsIdentity ) {
3570  size_t numRanges = 0;
3571  while ( gid < m_charStringsIndex.count ) {
3572  bds.Advance( 2 ); //size_t startSID = GetNext2BytesAsUnsignedInt( bds );
3573  gid += data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, size ) + 1;
3574  ++numRanges;
3575  }
3576  m_CharSetArrayPtr.resize( t4::add<size_t>( numRanges, 1 ) );
3577  m_CharSetArray = m_CharSetArrayPtr.data();
3578  bds.Seek(static_cast<file_size_type>(m_charSetRgn.begin)+1);
3579  gid = 1;
3580  numRanges = 0;
3581  bool needSort = false;
3582  while ( gid < m_charStringsIndex.count ) {
3583  m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_firstGID = gid;
3584  m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_firstSID = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 2 );
3585  gid += m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_numGlyphs = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, size ) + 1;
3586  if ( numRanges > 0 && m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_firstSID < m_CharSetArray[numRanges-1].m_firstSID )
3587  needSort = true;
3588  ++numRanges;
3589  }
3590  m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_firstGID = gid;
3591  m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_firstSID = 0xffffffff;
3592  m_CharSetArray[numRanges].m_numGlyphs = 0;
3593  if ( needSort )
3594  tetraphilia::qsort( &m_CharSetArray[0], numRanges, sizeof(CharSetElement), nullptr, &(SortCharSetElements<app_traits> ) );
3595  }
3596  break;
3597  default:
3598  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3599  }
3600  } break;
3601  }
3602 }

3604 template<typename app_traits>
3605 void CFF<app_traits>::ReadFDArray( data_io::BufferedDataStore& bds )
3606 {
3607  /* Read FDArray INDEX */
3608  if (m_FDArrayIndexRgn.begin == -1)
3609  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3610  ReadIndexRec( bds, static_cast<size_t>(m_FDArrayIndexRgn.begin), m_FDArrayIndex );
3611  if (m_FDArrayIndex.count > 256)
3612  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3613 
3614  m_FDArrayPtr.resize( m_FDArrayIndex.count );
3615  for ( size_t i = 0; i < m_FDArrayIndex.count; i++ ) {
3616  m_fd = &m_FDArrayPtr[i];
3617  ReadDict( bds, GetPos( bds, m_FDArrayIndex, i ), false/*isTopDict*/ );
3618  ReadPrivateDict( bds, static_cast<int>( i ) );
3619  }
3620 }

3646 
3647 template<typename app_traits>
3648 size_t CFF<app_traits>::ReadIndexRec( data_io::BufferedDataStore& bds, size_t startOffset, cfrIndexRec& rec )
3649 {
3650  bds.Seek( startOffset );
3651  rec.count = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 2 );
3652  if ( rec.count ) {
3653  rec.offSize = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, 1 );
3654  if ( rec.offSize < 1 || rec.offSize > 4 )
3655  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3656  rec.offsetToTable = startOffset + 2/*count*/ + 1/*offSize*/;
3657  rec.offsetToData = rec.offsetToTable + (rec.count+1)*rec.offSize;
3658 
3659  /* last offset in the table is the offset to the end of the data */
3660  bds.Seek( rec.offsetToData - rec.offSize );
3661  return rec.offsetToData + data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, rec.offSize ) - 1;
3662  }
3663  return startOffset + 2;
3664 }
3665 
3666 
3667 template<typename app_traits>
3668 CFFPos CFF<app_traits>::GetPos( data_io::BufferedDataStore& bds, const cfrIndexRec& rec, size_t element ) const
3669 {
3670  if ( element >= rec.count )
3671  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3672  bds.Seek( rec.offsetToTable + element*rec.offSize );
3673  CFFPos pos;
3674  pos.m_offset = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, rec.offSize );
3675  pos.m_len = data_io::BytesToInteger<size_t>( bds, rec.offSize ) - pos.m_offset;
3676  pos.m_offset += rec.offsetToData - 1;
3677  return pos;
3678 }

3680 // pop array from operand stack to dictArray struct
3681 template<typename app_traits, size_t max_len>
3682 inline void dictArray<app_traits, max_len>::readDeltaArray( CFFStack<app_traits>& stack )
3683 {
3684  readArray( stack ); // read delta values
3685  for ( size_t j = 1; j < count; j++ )
3686  data[j] += data[j-1]; // convert deltas to absolute
3687 }
3688 
3689 template<typename app_traits, size_t max_len>
3690 inline void dictArray<app_traits, max_len>::readArray( CFFStack<app_traits>& stack )
3691 {
3692  count = stack.Count();
3693  if ( count > max_len ){
3694  tetraphilia_assert_always();
3695  stack.Pop( count - max_len ); // discard extra operands
3696  count = max_len;
3697  }
3698  for ( size_t i = count; i > 0; i-- ) // reorder operands
3699  data[i-1] = stack.PopReal();
3700 }
3701 
3702 template<typename app_traits>
3703 void DoBinaryCodedDecimal( CFFStack<app_traits>& stack, const unsigned char*& src, const unsigned char* end )
3704 {
3705  typedef typename app_traits::real_geometry_traits::coord_type real_type;
3706 
3707  int count = 0;
3708  int nibble;
3709  std::int32_t mantissa = 0;
3710  std::int32_t fraction = 0;
3711  std::int32_t exponent = 0;
3712  std::int32_t *curInt = &mantissa;
3713  bool negateNumber = false, negateExponent = false, isReal = false, haveRoundingDigit = false;
3714  size_t fractionDigits = 0;
3715  const int maxInt = limits<int>::max() / 10;
3716 
3717  while ( true ) {
3718 
3719  if ( (count++ & 1) != 0 ) {
3720 
3721  nibble = *src & 0x0f;
3722  ++src;
3723 
3724  } else {
3725 
3726  if ( src == end )
3727  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3728  nibble = *src >> 4;
3729 
3730  }
3731  if ( nibble == 0x0f ) {
3732  if ( count & 1 )
3733  ++src;
3734  break;
3735  }
3736  else switch ( nibble ) {
3737 
3738  case 0x0d:
3739  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3740 
3741  case 0x0a: /* decimal point */
3742  if ( curInt != &mantissa )
3743  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3744  curInt = &fraction;
3745  isReal = true;
3746  break;
3747 
3748  case 0x0b: /* positive exponent */
3749  case 0x0c: /* negative exponent */
3750  if ( curInt == &exponent )
3751  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3752  curInt = &exponent;
3753  negateExponent = nibble == 0x0c;
3754  isReal = true;
3755  break;
3756 
3757  case 0x0e: /* minus sign */
3758  if ( count != 1 )
3759  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3760  negateNumber = true;
3761  break;
3762 
3763  default: /* digit */
3764  if ( curInt != &fraction || fractionDigits < tetraphilia::real_services::DivisionByPowersOfTen<std::int32_t, real_type>::kMaxDecimalDigits ) {
3765  if ( *curInt > maxInt )
3766  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3767  *curInt = *curInt * 10 + nibble;
3768  if ( curInt == &fraction )
3769  ++fractionDigits;
3770  } else if ( curInt == &fraction && !haveRoundingDigit ) {
3771  if ( nibble >= 5 )
3772  ++fraction;
3773  haveRoundingDigit = true;
3774  }
3775  break;
3776  }
3777 
3778  }
3779 
3780  if ( isReal ) {
3781  real_type frac = tetraphilia::real_services::DivisionByPowersOfTen<std::int32_t, real_type>::Compute( fraction, fractionDigits );
3782  real_type val = real_type( mantissa ) + frac;
3783  if ( negateExponent ) {
3784  for ( int i = 0; i < exponent; i++ )
3785  val /= 10;
3786  } else {
3787  for ( int i = 0; i < exponent; i++ )
3788  val *= 10;
3789  }
3790  stack.PushReal( negateNumber ? -val : val );
3791  } else {
3792  stack.PushInt( negateNumber ? -mantissa : mantissa );
3793  }
3794 }
3795 
3796 template<typename app_traits>
3797 void CFF<app_traits>::ReadDict( data_io::BufferedDataStore& bds, const CFFPos& pos,
3798  bool isTopDict )
3799 {
3800  auto& heap = *t4::get_thread_heap();
3801 
3802  bds.Seek( pos.m_offset );
3803  const char* dictBytes;
3804  bds.PeekBytesAssert( dictBytes, pos.m_len );
3805 
3806  abfFontDict<app_traits> *font = &m_fd->fdict;
3807  abfPrivateDict<app_traits> *priv = &font->privateDict;
3808 
3809  if (pos.m_len == 0) {
3810  /* Empty dictionary (assuming Private); valid but set BlueValues to
3811  avoid warning */
3812  m_fd->flags |= FDInfo<app_traits>::SEEN_BLUE_VALUES;
3813  return;
3814  }
3815 
3816  const unsigned char* src = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(dictBytes);
3817  const unsigned char* end = src + pos.m_len;
3818 
3819  CFFStack<app_traits>* stk = TRANSIENT_NEW( CFFStack<app_traits>, heap, (this->GetContext()) );
3820  CFFStack<app_traits>& stack( *stk );
3821 
3822  while (src < end) {
3823  switch (*src++) {
3824  case cff_version:
3825  m_top.version = stack.PopInt();
3826  break;
3827  case cff_Notice:
3828  m_top.Notice = stack.PopInt();
3829  break;
3830  case cff_FullName:
3831  m_top.FullName = stack.PopInt();
3832  break;
3833  case cff_FamilyName:
3834  m_top.FamilyName = stack.PopInt();
3835  break;
3836  case cff_Weight:
3837  m_top.Weight = stack.PopInt();
3838  break;
3839  case cff_FontBBox:
3840  m_top.FontBBox[3] = stack.PopReal();
3841  m_top.FontBBox[2] = stack.PopReal();
3842  m_top.FontBBox[1] = stack.PopReal();
3843  m_top.FontBBox[0] = stack.PopReal();
3844  break;
3845  case cff_BlueValues:
3846  priv->BlueValues.readDeltaArray( stack );
3847  m_fd->flags |= FDInfo<app_traits>::SEEN_BLUE_VALUES;
3848  break;
3849  case cff_OtherBlues:
3850  priv->OtherBlues.readDeltaArray( stack );
3851  break;
3852  case cff_FamilyBlues:
3853  priv->FamilyBlues.readDeltaArray( stack );
3854  break;
3855  case cff_FamilyOtherBlues:
3856  priv->FamilyOtherBlues.readDeltaArray( stack );
3857  break;
3858  case cff_StdHW:
3859  priv->StdHW = stack.PopReal();
3860  break;
3861  case cff_StdVW:
3862  priv->StdVW = stack.PopReal();
3863  break;
3864  case cff_escape:
3865  /* Process escaped operator */
3866  switch (32 + *src++) {
3867  case cff_Copyright:
3868  m_top.Copyright = stack.PopInt();
3869  break;
3870  case cff_isFixedPitch:
3871  m_top.isFixedPitch = stack.PopInt();
3872  break;
3873  case cff_ItalicAngle:
3874  m_top.ItalicAngle = stack.PopReal();
3875  break;
3876  case cff_UnderlinePosition:
3877  m_top.UnderlinePosition = stack.PopReal();
3878  break;
3879  case cff_UnderlineThickness:
3880  m_top.UnderlineThickness = stack.PopReal();
3881  break;
3882  case cff_PaintType:
3883  font->PaintType = stack.PopInt();
3884  break;
3885  case cff_CharstringType:
3886  switch ( stack.PopInt() ) {
3887  case 2:
3888  break;
3889  default:
3890  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3891  }
3892  break;
3893  case cff_FontMatrix: {
3894  bool useCID = isTopDict && m_flags & kCIDFont;
3895  matrix_type& mat = useCID ? m_top.CIDFontMatrix : font->FontMatrix;
3896  get_f( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3897  get_e( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3898  get_d( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3899  get_c( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3900  get_b( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3901  get_a( mat ) = stack.PopReal();
3902  if ( !useCID )
3903  font->FontMatrix = m_top.CIDFontMatrix * font->FontMatrix;
3904  } break;
3905  case cff_StrokeWidth:
3906  m_top.StrokeWidth = stack.PopReal();
3907  break;
3908  case cff_BlueScale:
3909  priv->BlueScale = stack.PopReal();
3910  break;
3911  case cff_BlueShift:
3912  priv->BlueShift = stack.PopReal();
3913  break;
3914  case cff_BlueFuzz:
3915  priv->BlueFuzz = stack.PopReal();
3916  break;
3917  case cff_StemSnapH:
3918  priv->StemSnapH.readDeltaArray( stack );
3919  break;
3920  case cff_StemSnapV:
3921  priv->StemSnapV.readDeltaArray( stack );
3922  break;
3923  case cff_ForceBold:
3924  priv->ForceBold = stack.PopInt();
3925  break;
3926  case cff_LanguageGroup:
3927  priv->LanguageGroup = stack.PopInt();
3928  break;
3929  case cff_ExpansionFactor:
3930  priv->ExpansionFactor = stack.PopReal();
3931  break;
3932  case cff_initialRandomSeed:
3933  priv->initialRandomSeed = stack.PopReal();
3934  break;
3935  case cff_PostScript:
3936  m_top.PostScript = stack.PopInt();
3937  break;
3938  case cff_BaseFontName:
3939  m_top.BaseFontName = stack.PopInt();
3940  break;
3941  case cff_BaseFontBlend:
3942  stack.ForceClear(); // no reason to save this array
3943  break;
3944  case cff_ROS:

3946  m_top.CIDOrdering = stack.PopInt();
3947  m_top.CIDRegistry = stack.PopInt();

3952  break;
3953  case cff_CIDFontRevision:
3954  m_top.CIDFontRevision = stack.PopInt();
3955  break;
3956  case cff_CIDFontType:

3958  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3959  break;
3960  case cff_CIDCount:
3961  m_top.CIDCount = stack.PopInt();
3962  break;
3963  case cff_UIDBase:
3964  m_top.CIDUIDBase = stack.PopInt();
3965  break;
3966  case cff_FDArray:
3967  m_FDArrayIndexRgn.begin = static_cast<int>( m_offsetToCFFData + stack.PopSizeT() );
3968  break;
3969  case cff_FDSelect:
3970  m_FDSelectRgn.begin = static_cast<int>( m_offsetToCFFData + stack.PopSizeT() );
3971  break;
3972  case cff_FontName:
3973  font->FontName = stack.PopInt();
3974  break;
3975  case cff_reservedESC15:
3976  /* Was cff_ForceBoldThreshold but was erroneously retained in
3977  snapshot MMs by cffsub. Report, but otherwise ignore. */
3978  //message(h, "defunct /ForceBoldThreshold operator (ignored)");
3979  stack.PopReal();
3980  break;
3981  case cff_SyntheticBase:
3982  case cff_Chameleon:
3983  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3984  case cff_reservedESC16:
3985  /* Was cff_lenIV but later removed from specification. Some
3986  Dainippon Screen fonts are using this operator with a value
3987  of -1 which is a no-op so can be safely ignored. */
3988  if ( stack.PopInt() != -1)
3989  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3990  break;
3991  case cff_reservedESC24:
3992  /* Was cff_MultipleMaster so this must be one of the old test
3993  MMs that are no longer supported. There are too many things
3994  that will break if an attempt is made to continue so just
3995  print a helpful message and quit. */
3996  throw t4::corrupt_data();
3997  case cff_reservedESC40:
3998  /* Was an experimental cff_VToHOrigin but the experiment was
3999  never conducted. However, it was implemented in cff_parse.c
4000  and Apple apparently saw it in that code and decided to use
4001  in their implementation of "Save As PDF" when subsetting
4002  fonts. Since it has never done anything it can be safely
4003  ignored. */
4004  //message(h, "defunct /VToHOrigin operator (ignored)");
4005  break;
4006  case cff_reservedESC41:
4007  /* Was an experimental cff_defaultWidthY but the experiment was
4008  never conducted. However, it was implemented in cff_parse.c
4009  and Apple apparently saw it in that code and decided to use
4010  in their implementation of "Save As PDF" when subsetting
4011  fonts. Since it has never done anything it can be safely
4012  ignored. */
4013  //message(h, "defunct /defaultWidthY operator (ignored)");
4014  break;
4015  case cff_reservedESC25:
4016  case cff_reservedESC26:
4017  case cff_reservedESC27:
4018  case cff_reservedESC28:
4019  case cff_reservedESC29:
4020  default:
4021  throw t4::corrupt_data();
4022  } /* End: switch (escop) */
4023  break;
4024  case cff_UniqueID:
4025  m_top.UniqueID = stack.PopInt();
4026  break;
4027  case cff_XUID:
4028  stack.ForceClear(); // no reason to save this array
4029  break;
4030  case cff_charset:
4031  m_charSetRgn.begin = stack.PopInt();
4032  if ( m_charSetRgn.begin > cff_ExpertSubsetCharset )
4033  m_charSetRgn.begin += m_offsetToCFFData;
4034  break;
4035  case cff_Encoding:
4036  m_encodingRgn.begin = stack.PopInt();
4037  if ( m_encodingRgn.begin > cff_ExpertEncoding )
4038  m_encodingRgn.begin += m_offsetToCFFData;
4039  break;
4040  case cff_CharStrings:
4041  m_charStringsRgn.begin = static_cast<int>( m_offsetToCFFData + stack.PopSizeT() );
4042  break;
4043  case cff_Private:
4044  m_fd->region.PrivateDict.begin = static_cast<int>( m_offsetToCFFData + stack.PopSizeT() );
4045  m_fd->region.PrivateDict.end = m_fd->region.PrivateDict.begin + stack.PopInt();
4046  break;
4047  case cff_Subrs:
4048  m_fd->region.LocalSubrIndexRgn.begin = static_cast<int>( pos.m_offset + stack.PopSizeT() );
4049  break;
4050  case cff_defaultWidthX:
4051  m_fd->aux.defaultWidthX = stack.PopReal();
4052  break;
4053  case cff_nominalWidthX:
4054  m_fd->aux.nominalWidthX = stack.PopReal();
4055  break;
4056  case cff_shortint: {
4057  /* 3 byte number */
4058  int value = static_cast<signed char>(*src);
4059  ++src;
4060  value = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned int>(value) << 8) + *src++;
4061  stack.PushInt( value );
4062  } continue;
4063  case cff_longint: {
4064  /* 5 byte number */
4065  int value = static_cast<signed char>(*src);
4066  ++src;
4067  value = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned int>(value)<<8) + *src++;
4068  value = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned int>(value)<<8) + *src++;
4069  value = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned int>(value)<<8) + *src++;
4070  stack.PushInt( value );
4071  } continue;
4072  case cff_BCD:
4073  DoBinaryCodedDecimal<app_traits>( stack, src, end );
4074  continue;
4075  default:
4076  /* 1 byte number */
4077  stack.PushInt( src[-1] - 139 );
4078  continue;
4079  case 247: case 248: case 249: case 250: {
4080  /* Positive 2 byte number */
4081  int value = 108 + 256*(src[-1] - 247);
4082  stack.PushInt( value + *src++ );
4083  } continue;
4084  case 251: case 252: case 253: case 254: {
4085  /* Negative 2 byte number */
4086  int value = -108 - 256*(src[-1] - 251);
4087  stack.PushInt( value - *src++ );
4088  } continue;
4089  case cff_reserved22:
4090  case cff_reserved23:
4091  case cff_reserved24:
4092  case cff_reserved25:
4093  case cff_reserved26:
4094  case cff_reserved27:
4095  case cff_reserved31:
4096  case cff_reserved255:
4097  throw t4::corrupt_data();
4098  } /* End: switch (byte0) */
4099  stack.Clear();
4100  } /* End: while (...) */
4101 }
4102 
4103 
4104 /* end of parsers namespace */
4105 }
4106 
4107 /* end of fonts namespace */
4108 }
4109

4111 struct object_size<fonts::parsers::CFFBitmapCache<app_traits> >
4112 {
4113  static inline size_t get(const fonts::parsers::CFFBitmapCache<app_traits>& bmc)
4114  {

4116  }
4117 };
